channel.title: [FoL] EFoL 3 - Cult Wins
channel.description:
# Many FoL have passed and so far we pressed DELETE on many things.
# Feedback had to go.
# Trials were trashed.
# What or who is next... :eyes:
# I am feeling experimental and am happy to introduce Experimental Forum of Lies 3!
# What will the Scythe banish next?
# [s]No Day 1 Lynch[/s]
# This rendition will start at Day 1 as normal, however there will be a lynch. Day 1 will last 72 hours or when majority is reached. Main evil factions start with an additional member, but cannot convert night 1. Prince can execute night 1.
---
# [s]Logs[/s] # Logs will not exist and any abilities interacting with them are ineffective as far as they pertain towards logs.
---
# [s]Massclaiming[/s] # [color=lavender]The Inquisitor[/color] joins the fray (potentially) No class will be forcibly rolled. > # [color=lavender]The Inquisitor[/color] :shield: :fire: > > [color=lavender]**Neutral Investigative**[/color] > **Zealous Pursuit (Passive)** - You hunt three heathens. Their starting classes are [x], [x] and [x]. They are ignorant of their own heresy. You will commit suicide after completing your righteous mission. > **Holy Blessing (Passive)** - You are death and bleed immune only once. > **Interrogate (Night)** - Learn whether target player is a heathen. Does not bypass tailors. - Infinite uses > **Ruthless Efficiency (Night)** - Kill target player bypassing everything. You cannot be prevented, occupied or redirected. This does not count as a visit. This ability only works if target player claimed to be one of the starting heathen classes and are that particular heathen and otherwise has no effect. Attach the relevant post(s) when using this ability. - Infinite uses > *Live to see all heathens die*.
> Heathens cannot be neutrals, unique Blue Dragon or Kings. Both factions will have at least one heathen.
># [color=lavender]The Inquisitive King (Unofficial Class)[/color] :shield: :fire: >[color=lavender]**Neutral Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, a vote to determine the next king will be held at start of the next day. **Archbishop (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two if there are more than 5 players alive except during a Grand Trial. Immune to occupation and redirection. You are immune to death and bleeding once. **Grand Trial (Day)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason lasting up to 24 hours possibly extending day. They may provide a defense within 12 hours, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guard Shakedown! (Night)** - Learn if target player is a heathen. If so they cannot be prevented from dying by any means this night. If not, they will be death immune this night. - Infinite uses > **Ruthless Efficiency (Night)** - Kill target player bypassing everything. You cannot be prevented, occupied or redirected. This does not count as a visit. This ability only works if target player claimed to be one of the starting heathen classes and are that particular heathen and otherwise has no effect. Attach the relevant post(s) when using this ability. - Infinite uses > *Live to see all heathens die*.
>Crowned from: >* Inquisitor
---
# General Gameplay Information Host is Solic Co-host is Maxwell VC-bot is Blizer
## Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
## Gameplay
* Days last 72 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 24 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread. * Recently changed classes will *NOT* be forcibly rolled and are not guaranteed unless stated.
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/accuse [player]” or “/vote [player]” * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
## [Feedback List ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082)
## Journals
# GONE
## Classlist
[color=purple]**The Unseen**[/color] and [color=darkred]**The Cult**[/color] spawn rate is **[color=purple]50%[/color] / [color=darkred]50%[/color]**
**King** **(65% <font color="steblue">Good</font>, 35% <font color="purple">Evil</font> / <font color="darkred">Devout</font>)** <font color="purple">**Mastermind**</font>/<font color="darkred">**Cult Leader**</font> <font color="purple">**Assassin**</font></font>/<font color="darkred">**Random Cult**</font> <font color="purple">**Random Unseen**</font></font>/<font color="darkred">**Random Cult**</font> <font color="steblue">**Prince**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> <font color="steblue">**Random Blue Dragon**</font> / <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Random Neutral Non-Killer**</font> <font color="grey">**Neutral Killer**</font>
## [Classes](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Playerlist 1. Priestess :crown: 2. Datbird 3. [s]Kape[/s] - Died Night 2 - [color=solblue]**The Knight**[/color] 4. ~~Alice~~ - Died Night 1 - [color=darkred]**The Ritualist**[/color] 5. AreteSlashStars 6. [s]KyoDaz[/s] - Died Night 2 - [color=solblue]**The Prince**[/color] 7. H_Hja 8. Kai_5 9. [s]Possessed[/s] - Died Night 2 - [color=solblue]**The Chronomancer**[/color] 10. WazzaAzza 11. Htm 12. [s]Sulit[/s] - Lynched Day 2 - [color=solblue]**The Observer**[/color] 13. Frostwolf103 14. [s]Soulshade55r[/s] - Died Night 2 - [color=solblue]**The Priest**[/color] 15. [s]Magnus[/s] - Lynched Day 1 - [color=solblue]**The Physician**[/color] 16. Astand 17. [s]Twil1ight[/s] SogMan
### Backups: 1. Ozzkozz 2. SirDerpsAlot 3. Mercenary
### Spectators: 1. Marshal 2. Isaac_Gonzalez 3. Geyde

(I was actually a little concerned that if I turned out to be wrong there, everyone would think I was Cultseen for defending Soul so hard.)

item.title: [FoL] EFoL 3 - Cult Wins
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
That’s completely my fault. Debauch cannot target the king in FoL. There are a lot of stealth changes made by FoL to ToL, same class cards and abilities, but different non-written mechanics, which are making it extremely difficult for ToL players to host FoL. When I’m hosting FoL, there will always be ToL mechanics accidentally bleeding into FoL. You can’t follow non-written rules you don’t know /shrug

Read full topic
